description: Creates a campaign for the specified Amazon Connect account. This API is idempotent.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of an Amazon Connect Campaign name.

parameters.name: channelSubtypeConfig
parameters.description: Campaign Channel Subtype config telephony (dict) --- Telephony Channel Subtype config capacity (float) --- Allocates outbound capacity for the specific channel subtype of this campaign between multiple active campaigns connectQueueId (string) --- The queue for the call. If you specify a queue, the phone displayed for caller ID is the phone number specified in the queue. If you do not specify a queue, the queue defined in the contact flow is used. If you do not specify a queue, you must specify a source phone number. Telephony Outbound Mode progressive (dict) --- Progressive config The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource. predictive (dict) --- Predictive config The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource. agentless (dict) --- Agentless config Default Telephony Outbound config The identifier of the contact flow for the outbound call. connectSourcePhoneNumber (string) --- The phone number associated with the Amazon Connect instance, in E.164 format. If you do not specify a source phone number, you must specify a queue. answerMachineDetectionConfig (dict) --- Answering Machine Detection config Enable or disable answering machine detection awaitAnswerMachinePrompt (boolean) --- Enable or disable await answer machine prompt sms (dict) --- SMS Channel Subtype config capacity (float) --- Allocates outbound capacity for the specific channel subtype of this campaign between multiple active campaigns SMS Outbound Mode agentless (dict) --- Agentless config Default SMS Outbound config Amazon Resource Names(ARN) Amazon Resource Names(ARN) email (dict) --- Email Channel Subtype config capacity (float) --- Allocates outbound capacity for the specific channel subtype of this campaign between multiple active campaigns Email Outbound Mode agentless (dict) --- Agentless config Default Email Outbound config Source/Destination Email address used for Email messages sourceEmailAddressDisplayName (string) --- Display name for Email Address Amazon Resource Names(ARN)

nested_params.name: capacity
nested_params.description: Allocates outbound capacity for the specific channel subtype of this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

nested_params.name: connectQueueId
nested_params.description: The queue for the call. If you specify a queue, the phone displayed for caller ID is the phone number specified in the queue. If you do not specify a queue, the queue defined in the contact flow is used. If you do not specify a queue, you must specify a source phone number.

nested_params.name: bandwidthAllocation
nested_params.description: The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource.

nested_params.description: The identifier of the contact flow for the outbound call.

nested_params.name: connectSourcePhoneNumber
nested_params.description: The phone number associated with the Amazon Connect instance, in E.164 format. If you do not specify a source phone number, you must specify a queue.

nested_params.name: enableAnswerMachineDetection
nested_params.description: Enable or disable answering machine detection.

nested_params.name: awaitAnswerMachinePrompt
nested_params.description: Enable or disable await answer machine prompt.

nested_params.description: Allocates outbound capacity for the specific channel subtype of this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

nested_params.description: Source/Destination Email address used for Email messages.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source of the campaign customerProfilesSegmentArn (string) --- Amazon Resource Names(ARN) eventTrigger (dict) --- Event trigger of the campaign customerProfilesDomainArn (string) --- Amazon Resource Names(ARN)

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: Campaign schedule Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone refreshFrequency (string) --- Time duration in ISO 8601 format.

nested_params.name: startTime
nested_params.description: Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone.

nested_params.name: endTime
nested_params.description: Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone.

parameters.name: communicationTimeConfig
parameters.description: Campaign communication time config Local time zone config defaultTimeZone (string) --- Time Zone Id in the IANA format localTimeZoneDetection (list) --- Local TimeZone Detection method list (string) --- Local TimeZone Detection method. telephony (dict) --- Time window config Open Hours config dailyHours (dict) --- Daily Hours map (string) --- Day of week enum (list) --- List of time range (dict) --- Time range in 24 hour format Time in ISO 8601 format, e.g. T23:11 Time in ISO 8601 format, e.g. T23:11 restrictedPeriods (dict) --- Restricted period config restrictedPeriodList (list) --- List of restricted period (dict) --- Restricted period name (string) --- The name of a restricted period. Date in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2024-01-01 Date in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2024-01-01 sms (dict) --- Time window config Open Hours config dailyHours (dict) --- Daily Hours map (string) --- Day of week enum (list) --- List of time range (dict) --- Time range in 24 hour format Time in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2024-01-01 email (dict) --- Time window config Open Hours config dailyHours (dict) --- Daily Hours map (string) --- Day of week enum (list) --- List of time range (dict) --- Time range in 24 hour format Time in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2024-01-01

parameters.name: communicationLimitsOverride
parameters.description: Communication limits config allChannelSubtypes (dict) --- Communication limits communicationLimitsList (list) --- List of communication limit (dict) --- Communication Limit Maximum number of contacts allowed for a given target within the given frequency. The number of days to consider with regards to this limit. The communication limit time unit.

nested_params.name: maxCountPerRecipient
nested_params.description: Maximum number of contacts allowed for a given target within the given frequency.

nested_params.name: frequency
nested_params.description: The number of days to consider with regards to this limit.

parameters.description: Tag map with key and value. (string) --- The key of tag. (string) --- The value of tag.

nested_items.description: The resource name of an Amazon Connect campaign.
